column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Favorite date spot in the city!!!  Cozy
column4: perfect ambiance.  We have been here many times and have never been disappointed.  All the food is amazing
column5: my favorite is the roasted chicken
column6: by far the best chicken I have ever had.  The boyfriend says the steaks are simply outstanding
column7: better than any other Chicago steakhouse.  We request Brandon as our server he is awesome and has perfect wine recommendations every time.  Make reservations today they book up fast!
